snippet.title: Queen of Phobos walkthrough/longplay (Apple II - Phoenix Software)
snippet.description:
Queen of Phobos (http://gue.cgwmuseum.org/galleries/index.php?pub=1&item=3&id=2&key=0) was a graphics adventure game published by Phoenix Software in 1982 for the Apple ][.

I like its simple, elegant graphics and its peppy parser. The few animated scenes are well executed, especially the zombie one.

Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

Credits:
Cover art - gue.cgwmuseum.org
Walkthrough - The Book of Adventure Games by Kim Schuette
